text: Updated ( April 19 ) : The rehab facility has since released a statement to claim that Matthew Mellon died at his hotel room prior to his scheduled check - in at Clear Sky Recovery. Dr. Alberto Sola, Medical Director of Clear Sky Recovery, said : ` ` Matthew Mellon arrived in Cancun Mexico with his private entourage on Sunday, April 15, 2018. He arrived by private plane and checked into his hotel in Cancun Mexico. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Mr. Mellon was scheduled to check - in at Clear Sky Recovery on Monday April 16, 2018. We received word that he had died at his hotel on the morning of April 16th, prior to his scheduled check - in. We have no further comment regarding this unfortunate situation.'' Original story ( April 17 ) : Tamara Mellon
